Package fi.thuy.recipecontents

Class RecipeListAdapterListView

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<RecipeListAdapterListView.MyViewClass>
      • fi.thuy.recipecontents.RecipeListAdapterListView
  • public class RecipeListAdapterListView
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<RecipeListAdapterListView.MyViewClass>
    This adapter class is responsible for making a View for each item in the recipeList which will be populated in the List view activity

        Parameters:
        context - used to pass the reference of the current class
        recipeList - stores the list of recipe/item that needs to be populated in the listView. Value cannot be null.
        onCardListener - opens a new activity of a specific recipe when clicked.
